background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

mobile_logo.label: Mobile logo
mobile_logo.info: Optional. The logo will use the main logo on mobile by default.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

paragraph.content: Add a brand description to your store's footer.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

variant_pills.name: Variant pills
variant_pills.paragraph: Variant pills are one way of displaying your product variants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#variant-picker-block)

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals, and cart pop-ups.

settings.paragraph: Checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

paragraph__grid.content: Affects areas with multiple columns or rows.

image_behavior.label: Image behavior
image_behavior.info: Zoom in on scroll will only work if the 'Reveal sections on scroll' option is enabled.

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

image_shape.label: Image shape
image_shape.info: Standard-styled cards have no borders when an image shape is active.

seprater.label: Seprater between text
seprater.info: This feature will only work when svg is none from block

header__1.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__3.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

type.label: Design type
type.info: This feature only work when collection is standard

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

rows_desktop.label: Number of rows
rows_desktop.info: This feature will work only when the carousel is enabled

card_flex_direction.info: This feature will work only when the text below image

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

embed_code.label: Google maps embed code
embed_code.info: Show your shop's location in Google Maps. You can find the embed code by searching your store in Google Maps, clicking 'Share' and then choosing 'Embed a map'. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

iconwidth.label: Icon width
iconwidth.info: This option work only on desktop view

image.label: Image
image.info: For best results, use an image with a 300 X 600 size.

show_description.label: Show collection description from the admin

enddate.label: End date
enddate.info: The end date must be set to a future date and include the following format: YYYY/MM/DD Example: 2024/10/05.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

color_swatchhover.label: Display only color
color_swatchhover.info: This is used for display only color and change product image on variant hover. It only applicable when 'add to cart button' and 'variant' is disabled

show_stock_onlyinfo.label: Applicable when stock bar is enabled

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick look button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

show_colorswatch.label: Enable color swatches
show_colorswatch.info: Requires type to be set to 'Pills'. [Learn how to setup swatches](https://webibazaar.gitbook.io/veena-documentation/color-swatches)

image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 1:1 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

descriptions.label: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-product-rating)

media_position.label: Desktop media position
media_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

paragraph.content: This block will display your brand information. [Edit brand information.](/editor?context=theme&category=brand%20information)

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__8.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

header__9.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

show_acicon.label: Account
show_acicon.info: This option work only on desktop view

menu_type_desktop.label: Desktop menu type
menu_type_desktop.info: Menu type is automatically optimized for mobile.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

menuname.label: Menu label
menuname.info: Enter menu item to apply a mega menu, when the mega menu is added, the link to the parent menu will not work. [Learn how to setup mega menu](https://webibazaar.gitbook.io/veena-documentation/header/mega-menu)

secondary_menu.label: Secondary menu
secondary_menu.info: The secondary menu will not show when the 'Logo left, menu center' setting is enabled. This menu will not show dropdown items.

menu_style.label: Menu style
menu_style.info: This option work only when the 'Logo center, menu bottom' setting is enabled.

menu_position.label: Menu position
menu_position.info: This option not work when the 'Logo left, menu center' setting is enabled.

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

adapt_height_first_image.label: Adapt section height to first image size
adapt_height_first_image.info: Overwrites image banner height setting when checked.

button_label_1.label: Button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

layout.label: Desktop image placement
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

image_layout.label: Desktop image placement
image_layout.info: Placement is automatically optimized for mobile.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

sidebar-position.label: Sidebar position
sidebar-position.info: This feature will work only in desktop

Recent-Blog.label: Recent blog
Recent-Blog.info: Add the name of the blog you want to show the recent post of the blog

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-grid-section-settings)

enable_tags.label: Enable filtering
enable_tags.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

img_position.label: Position in results
img_position.info: Inserts the  media promotion before the product card in this position. only applies to the first page of results.

image.info: Media promotion block will not display in collection list view.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

logo_help.content: Edit your logo in theme settings.

stock_countdown.label: Maximum stock
stock_countdown.info: Adjust maximum stock for stock countdown.

limited_stock_cut_off.label: Limit stock cut off
limited_stock_cut_off.info: Adjust limited stock cut off for stock countdown.

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

icon.info: Visible when collapsible row is displayed.

content.label: Content
content.info: Choose an icon or add an image for each column or row.

heading.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

media_size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

image_zoom.label: Image zoom
image_zoom.info: Click and hover defaults to open lightbox on mobile.

media_position.label: Desktop media position
media_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants’ media after selecting a variant

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#search-results-section-settings)

header__2.info: Blog card styles also apply to page cards in search results. To change card styles update your theme settings.

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

show_text_below.label: Show content below image on mobile
show_text_below.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label_1.label: Button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

enable_mute.label: Mute video
enable_mute.info: If autoplay is enabled, the sound of the video will be muted.

paragraph.content: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

image_behavior.info: This feature only work when video not added.

show_text_below.label: Show content below images on mobile

accessibility.label: Slideshow description
accessibility.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

image.label: Image
image.info: If the selects a video, please treat the slideshow image as the cover image.

mobile_image.label: Mobile image
mobile_image.info: Optional. The newsletter will use the main image on mobile by default.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

link_window.label: Open this link in a new window

box_align.label: Desktop content position
box_align.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

container_color_scheme.label: Container color scheme
container_color_scheme.info: Visible when Layout is set to Row or Section container.

desktop_layout.label: Desktop layout
desktop_layout.info: Image is always first on mobile.
